Methods:

API Description API Path
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Return a list of all AWS accounts		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Add a AWS account to cloud serivce manager		 POST /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Delete AWS account information		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Returns the details of the particular AWS account		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Synchronizes Aws account related inventory like Regions, Vpcs, Instances Status of inventory synchronization can be known from Aws account status api 		POST /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>?action=sync_inventory
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Update a AWS account information		 PUT /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Returns a list of desired regions for a particular AWS account		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>/desired-regions
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Updates the list of desired regions for a particular AWS account		 PUT /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>/desired-regions
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Accounts
Return status of the account like credentials validity, inventory synchronization status and inventory synchronization state 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/accounts/<account-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateway AMIS
DEPRECATED. This API is needed only in NSX Cloud as a Service workflow, which is discontinued. Returns a list of Aws Gateway Amis. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/gateway-amis (Deprecated)
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateway AMIS
DEPRECATED. This API is needed only in NSX Cloud as a Service workflow, which is discontinued. Registers a AWS Gateway AMI for the region specified in the body. One can register only one gateway AMI ID per region. If a gateway AMI is already registered with a region, user is expected to use update API to overwrite the registerd AMI for a region. 		POST /api/v1/csm/aws/gateway-amis (Deprecated)
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateway AMIS
DEPRECATED. This API is needed only in NSX Cloud as a Service workflow, which is discontinued. Delete a AWS Gateway AMI. 		DELETE /api/v1/csm/aws/gateway-amis/<region-id> (Deprecated)
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateway AMIS
DEPRECATED. This API is needed only in NSX Cloud as a Service workflow, which is discontinued. Returns AWS Gateway AMI for a particular region. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/gateway-amis/<region-id> (Deprecated)
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateway AMIS
DEPRECATED. This API is needed only in NSX Cloud as a Service workflow, which is discontinued. Update a AWS Gateway AMI. 		PUT /api/v1/csm/aws/gateway-amis/<region-id> (Deprecated)
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateways
Returns configuration information for all gateways		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/gateways
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateways
Deploys gateway for the specified VPC		 POST /api/v1/csm/aws/gateways?action=deploy
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateways
Undeploys gateway for the specified VPC		 POST /api/v1/csm/aws/gateways?action=undeploy
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateways
Returns configuration for primary gateway and secondary gateway for the vpc,if exists. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/gateways/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateways
Updates configuration for primary gateway and secondary gateway for the vpc, if exists. 		PUT /api/v1/csm/aws/gateways/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Gateways
Returns status information for primary gateway and secondary gateway for the vpc, if exists. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/gateways/<vpc-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Key Pairs
Returns a list of Aws Key Pairs		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/key-pairs
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Key Pairs
Returns a list of subnets		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/subnets
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Regions
Returns a list of Aws regions		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/regions
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Regions
Returns information about the particular Aws Region		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/regions/<region-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Resources
Returns a list of AWS public IPs		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/public-ips
Cloud Service Manager > AWS Resources
Returns a list of AWS security groups. Deprecated: Please use /csm/aws/vpcs/<vpc-id>/security-groups instead. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs/security-groups (Deprecated)
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Returns the list of configuration of the compute VPC. The configuration contains quarantine policy and fall back security group of compute VPC and the information related to transit VPC. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/compute-vpcs
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Offboards a compute VPC.		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/aws/compute-vpcs/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Returns the configuration of the compute VPC. The configuration contains quarantine policy and fall back security group of compute VPC and the information related to transit VPC. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/compute-vpcs/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Onboards a compute VPC to be NSX managed by a transit VPC.		 POST /api/v1/csm/aws/compute-vpcs/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Updates the NSX configuration related to managed compute VPC using a transit VPC.		 PUT /api/v1/csm/aws/compute-vpcs/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Returns the status of the compute vpc. The status corresponds to onboard or offboard status of a compute VPC. 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/compute-vpcs/<vpc-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Returns a list of Vpcs. Support optional query parameters like account_id, region_id, cidr and/or op_status 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs
Cloud Service Manager > AWS VPCS
Returns Vpc information		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs/<vpc-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS > VPCS > Security Groups
Returns a list of AWS security groups corresponding to a VPC 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs/<vpc-id>/security-groups
Cloud Service Manager > AWS > VPCS > Security Groups
Returns information about a particular AWS security group 		GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs/<vpc-id>/security-groups/<security-group-id>
Cloud Service Manager > AWS > VPCS > Service Endpoints
Returns list of AWS serivce endpoints corresponding to a VPC		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs/<vpc-id>/service-endpoints
Cloud Service Manager > AWS > VPCS > Service Endpoints
Returns information about a particular AWS serivce endpoint		 GET /api/v1/csm/aws/vpcs/<vpc-id>/service-endpoints/<service-endpoint-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Accounts Statistics
Returns statistics for all Accounts		 GET /api/v1/csm/accounts/statistics
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Returns a list of Azure accounts		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Add a Azure account to cloud serivce manager		 POST /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Delete Azure account information		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Returns information about a particular Azure account		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Synchronizes Azure account inventory		 POST /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>?action=sync_inventory
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Update a Azure account information		 PUT /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Returns a list of desired regions for a particular Azure account		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>/desired-regions
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Updates the list of desired regions for a particular Azure account		 PUT /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>/desired-regions
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Accounts
Returns the status of Azure account		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/accounts/<account-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Gateways
Returns configuration information for all Azure gateways		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Gateways
Undeploys gateway for the specified virtual network		 POST /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways?action=undeploy
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Gateways
Deploys gateway for the specified virtual network		 POST /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways?action=deploy
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Gateways
Returns configuration of the Azure gateway		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Gateways
Updates Azure gateway configuration		 PUT /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Gateways
Return the status of Azure gateway		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/<vnet-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > Azure IP Allocations
Returns IP allocations for all Azure Vnets. This operation is only supported for containers. 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/ip-mappings
Cloud Service Manager > Azure IP Allocations
Allocates IPs in the specified Azure Vnet		 POST /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/ip-mappings
Cloud Service Manager > Azure IP Allocations
Releases allocated IPs in the specified Azure Vnet		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/ip-mappings/<mapping-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure IP Allocations
Returns status information for primary gateway and secondary gateway for the vnet, if exists. This operation is only supported for containers. 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/gateways/ip-mappings/<mapping-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Regions
Returns a list of Azure regions		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/regions
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Regions
Returns information about a particular Azure region		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/regions/<region-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Resources
Returns a list of Azure public IPs		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/public-ips
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Resources
Returns a list of Azure security groups		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/resource-groups
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Resources
Returns a list of Azure Storage Accounts		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/storage-accounts
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Resources
Returns a list of Azure subnets		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/subnets
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Returns the configuration of the compute VNet. The configuration contains quarantine policy and fall back security group of compute VNet and the information related to transit VNet. 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/compute-vnets
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Offboards a compute VNet.		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/azure/compute-vnets/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Returns the configuration of the compute VNet. The configuration contains quarantine policy and fall back security group of compute VNet and the information related to transit VNet. 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/compute-vnets/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Onboards a compute VNet to be NSX managed by a transit VNet.		 POST /api/v1/csm/azure/compute-vnets/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Updates the NSX configuration related to managed compute VNET using a transit VNET.		 PUT /api/v1/csm/azure/compute-vnets/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Returns the status of the compute VNet. The status corresponds to onboard or offboard status of a compute VNet. 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/compute-vnets/<vnet-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Returns a list of Azure virtual networks		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/vnets
Cloud Service Manager > Azure Vnets
Returns information about a particular Azure virtual network		 GET /api/v1/csm/azure/vnets/<vnet-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure > Security Groups
Returns a list of Azure security groups corresponding to a VNet 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/security-groups
Cloud Service Manager > Azure > Security Groups
Returns information about a particular Azure security group 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/security-groups/<security-group-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Azure > Vnets > Service Endpoints
Returns a list of Azure service endpoints corresponding to a VNet 		GET /api/v1/csm/azure/vnets/<vnet-id>/service-endpoints
Cloud Service Manager > Cloud Service Manager
Refreshes encryption keys		 POST /api/v1/csm/csmconfig/encryption-keys?action=refresh
Cloud Service Manager > Cloud Service Manager
Return Csm status information		 GET /api/v1/csm/csmstatus
Cloud Service Manager > Cloud Types
Return information on CSM cloud types		 GET /api/v1/csm/desired-clouds
Cloud Service Manager > Cloud Types
Update the selection of CSM cloud types		 PUT /api/v1/csm/desired-clouds
Cloud Service Manager > Manager Configuration
Read NSX Cloud Service Manager Nodes global configuration.		 GET /api/v1/csm/configs/management
Cloud Service Manager > Manager Configuration
Update NSX Cloud Service Manager nodes global configuration		 PUT /api/v1/csm/configs/management
Cloud Service Manager > NSX Manager Accounts
Returns a list of NSX Manager accounts		 GET /api/v1/csm/nsx-manager-accounts
Cloud Service Manager > NSX Manager Accounts
Create a NSX Manager account		 POST /api/v1/csm/nsx-manager-accounts
Cloud Service Manager > NSX Manager Accounts
Delete a NSX Manager account		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/nsx-manager-accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > NSX Manager Accounts
Returns the particular NSX Manager account information		 GET /api/v1/csm/nsx-manager-accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > NSX Manager Accounts
Update a NSX Manager account		 PUT /api/v1/csm/nsx-manager-accounts/<account-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Proxy Server Profile
Returns a list of Proxy Server Profiles		 GET /api/v1/csm/proxy-server-profiles
Cloud Service Manager > Proxy Server Profile
Create a Proxy Server Profile		 POST /api/v1/csm/proxy-server-profiles
Cloud Service Manager > Proxy Server Profile
Delete a Proxy Server Profile		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/proxy-server-profiles/<profile-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Proxy Server Profile
Returns the particular Proxy Server Profile information		 GET /api/v1/csm/proxy-server-profiles/<profile-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Proxy Server Profile
Update a Proxy Server Profile		 PUT /api/v1/csm/proxy-server-profiles/<profile-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Supported Regions
Returns supported regions per cloud		 GET /api/v1/csm/supported-regions
Cloud Service Manager > System Configuration
Read NSX Cloud Service Manager system configuration.		 GET /api/v1/csm/configs/system-config
Cloud Service Manager > System Configuration
Update NSX Cloud Service Manager system configuration.		 PUT /api/v1/csm/configs/system-config
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Returns all the NSX managed CSM VPN endpoints 		GET /api/v1/csm/vpn/endpoints
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Returns the state of the public cloud routing tables from a VPN point of view. 		GET /api/v1/csm/vpn/routing-tables/state
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Create a VPN session in cloud service manager.		 POST /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Delete a CSM VPN session		 DELETE /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions/<session-id>
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Returns the details of the particular CSM VPN session		 GET /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions/<session-id>
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Re-establish an existing CSM VPN session in errored state. If the create of an CSM VPN session errored out and the state is DOWN, this call can be made. CSM will attempt to re-create any missing NSX entities and attempt to re-establish the session. 		POST /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions/<session-id>?action=recreate
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Update an existing CSM VPN session information		 PUT /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions/<session-id>
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Returns the status and details of the particular CSM VPN session		 GET /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions/<session-id>/status
Cloud Service Manager > VPN
Returns the statuses of the CSM VPN sessions. 		GET /api/v1/csm/vpn/sessions/status
Cloud Service Manager > Virtual Machines
Returns the list of all virtual machines created or imported under a particular account id. Supports optional query parameters like region id, vpc id, public_ip, is_gateway.		 GET /api/v1/csm/virtual-machines
Cloud Service Manager > Virtual Machines
Update virtual machine config		 POST /api/v1/csm/virtual-machines?action=update_config
Cloud Service Manager > Virtual Machines
Returns information about the particular virtual machine		 GET /api/v1/csm/virtual-machines/<virtual-machine-id>
Cloud Service Manager > Virtual Machines > Firewall Rules
Details of NSX firewall rules of cloud virtual machine		 GET /api/v1/csm/virtual-machines/<virtual-machine-id>/firewall-rules
Federation > Federation Configuration
Read federation config		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/federation-config
GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/federation-config
Federation > Federation Configuration
Read Global Manager config along with sensitive data		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/global-manager-config?action=show-sensitive-data
Federation > Full Synchronization
Performs realized object actions specified in the action.		 POST /policy/api/v1/infra/full-sync-action
Federation > Full Synchronization
List full sync states		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/full-sync-states
GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/full-sync-states
Federation > Full Synchronization
Get full sync state		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/full-sync-states/<full-sync-id>
GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/full-sync-states/<full-sync-id>
Federation > Global Managers
List Global Managers		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/global-managers
Federation > Global Managers
Read a Global Manager		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/global-managers/<global-manager-id>
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get inter-site status of the edge cluster		 GET /api/v1/edge-clusters/<edge-cluster-id>/inter-site/status
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get infra segment cross site forwarder placement and HA status		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/segments/<segment-id>/inter-site-forwarder/site-span-info
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get infra segment cross site traffic statistics		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/segments/<segment-id>/inter-site-forwarder/status
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get RTEP span and mac address-table		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/tier-0s/<tier-0-id>/locale-services/<locale-services-id>/inter-site/bgp-summary
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get RTEP mesh connectivity status		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/tier-0s/<tier-0-id>/locale-services/<locale-services-id>/inter-site/status
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get segment cross site forwarder placement and HA status		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/tier-1s/<tier-1-id>/segments/<segment-id>/inter-site-forwarder/site-span-info
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get segment cross site traffic statistics		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/tier-1s/<tier-1-id>/segments/<segment-id>/inter-site-forwarder/status
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get L2 forwarder remote mac addresses		 GET /api/v1/logical-switches/<logical-switch-id>/inter-site-forwarder/site-span-info (Experimental)
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get L2 forwarder statistics		 GET /api/v1/logical-switches/<logical-switch-id>/inter-site-forwarder/statistics (Experimental)
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get L2 forwarder status		 GET /api/v1/logical-switches/<logical-switch-id>/inter-site-forwarder/status (Experimental) (Deprecated)
Federation > Inter-Sites
Paginated list of BGP Neighbors on edge transport node		 GET /api/v1/transport-nodes/<edge-node-id>/inter-site/bgp/neighbors
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get BGP neighbor advertised routes on edge transport node		 GET /api/v1/transport-nodes/<edge-node-id>/inter-site/bgp/neighbors/<neighbor-id>/advertised-routes
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get BGP neighbor learned routes on edge transport node		 GET /api/v1/transport-nodes/<edge-node-id>/inter-site/bgp/neighbors/<neighbor-id>/routes
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get inter-site BGP summary of edge node		 GET /api/v1/transport-nodes/<edge-node-id>/inter-site/bgp/summary (Deprecated)
Federation > Inter-Sites
Get inter-site statistics of edge node		 GET /api/v1/transport-nodes/<edge-node-id>/inter-site/statistics
Federation > Observability
Get monitoring info		 GET /policy/api/v1/observability/flow-details
Federation > Sites
Get site offboarding status.		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/site/offboarding-status
Federation > Sites
List Sites		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/sites
GET /policy/api/v1/infra/sites
Federation > Sites
Delete a site		 DELETE /policy/api/v1/infra/sites/<site-id>
Federation > Sites
Read a site		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/sites/<site-id>
GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/sites/<site-id>
Federation > Sites
Create or patch Site		 PATCH /policy/api/v1/infra/sites/<site-id>
Federation > Sites
Create or fully replace a Site under infra		 PUT /policy/api/v1/infra/sites/<site-id>
Federation > Sites
Returns the certificate of the listener		 GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/sites/listener_certificate
GET /policy/api/v1/infra/sites/listener_certificate
Federation > Sites
Get span for an entity with specified path		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/span
GET /policy/api/v1/global-infra/span
Management Plane API > Associations
Get ResourceReference objects to which the given resource belongs to 		GET /api/v1/associations
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
List IPSets		 GET /api/v1/ip-sets
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
Delete IPSet		 DELETE /api/v1/ip-sets/<ip-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
Read IPSet		 GET /api/v1/ip-sets/<ip-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
Add a IP address to a IPSet		 POST /api/v1/ip-sets/<ip-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
Update IPSet		 PUT /api/v1/ip-sets/<ip-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
Get all IPAddresses in a IPSet		 GET /api/v1/ip-sets/<ip-set-id>/members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > IP Sets
Create MACSet		 POST /api/v1/mac-sets
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
List MACSets		 GET /api/v1/mac-sets
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
Delete MACSet		 DELETE /api/v1/mac-sets/<mac-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
Read MACSet		 GET /api/v1/mac-sets/<mac-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
Update MACSet		 PUT /api/v1/mac-sets/<mac-set-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
Get all MACAddresses in a MACSet		 GET /api/v1/mac-sets/<mac-set-id>/members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
Add a MAC address to a MACSet		 POST /api/v1/mac-sets/<mac-set-id>/members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > MAC Sets
Remove a MAC address from given MACSet		 DELETE /api/v1/mac-sets/<mac-set-id>/members/<mac-address>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
List NSGroups		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Create NSGroup		 POST /api/v1/ns-groups
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Delete NSGroup		 DELETE /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Read NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Add NSGroup expression		 POST /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Update NSGroup		 PUT /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get consolidated Effective IPAddress translated from the NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/consolidated-effective-ip-address-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective Cloud Native Service Instances of the specified NSGroup.		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-cloud-native-service-instance-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective Directory Groups of the specified NSGroup.		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-directory-group-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective IPAddress translated from the NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-ip-address-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective IPSets of the specified NSGroup.		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-ipset-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective Logical Ports translated from the NSgroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-logical-port-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective switch members translated from the NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-logical-switch-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective Physical Server Memebers of the specified NSGroup.		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-physical-server-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get effective transport node members translated from the NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-transport-node-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get effective VIF members translated from the NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-vif-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get Effective Virtual Machine members of the specified NSGroup.		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/effective-virtual-machine-members
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get member types from NSGroup		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<ns-group-id>/member-types
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get services to which the given nsgroup belongs to 		GET /api/v1/ns-groups/<nsgroup-id>/service-associations
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Get the list of all the virtual machines that are not a part of any existing NSGroup.		 GET /api/v1/ns-groups/unassociated-virtual-machines
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Groups
Create NSProfile		 POST /api/v1/ns-profiles
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Profiles
Create IPSet		 POST /api/v1/ip-sets
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Profiles
List NSProfiles		 GET /api/v1/ns-profiles
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Profiles
Delete NSProfile		 DELETE /api/v1/ns-profiles/<ns-profile-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Profiles
Read NSProfile		 GET /api/v1/ns-profiles/<ns-profile-id>
Management Plane API > Grouping Objects > NS Profiles
Update NSProfile		 PUT /api/v1/ns-profiles/<ns-profile-id>

Policy > Security > East West Security > Distributed Firewall > Settings > Firewall Identity Store > Groups
Search for directory groups within a domain based on the substring of a distinguished name. (e.g. CN=User,DC=acme,DC=com) The search filter pattern can optionally support multiple (up to 100 maximum) search pattern separated by '|' (url encoded %7C). In this case, the search results will be returned as the union of all matching criteria. (e.g. CN=Ann,CN=Users,DC=acme,DC=com|CN=Bob,CN=Users,DC=acme,DC=com)		 GET /policy/api/v1/infra/firewall-identity-stores/<firewall-identity-store-id>/groups

System Administration > Configuration > Directory Service > Groups
Search for directory groups within a domain based on the substring of a distinguished name. (e.g. CN=User,DC=acme,DC=com) The search filter pattern can optionally support multiple (up to 100 maximum) search pattern separated by '|' (url encoded %7C). In this case, the search results will be returned as the union of all matching criteria. (e.g. CN=Ann,CN=Users,DC=acme,DC=com|CN=Bob,CN=Users,DC=acme,DC=com)		 GET /api/v1/directory/domains/<domain-id>/groups (Deprecated)
System Administration > Configuration > Directory Service > Groups
List members of a directory group		 GET /api/v1/directory/domains/<domain-id>/groups/<group-id>/member-groups (Deprecated)

DELETE /api/v1/aaa/registration-token/<token>
System Administration > Settings > User Management > Access Token
Get registration access token		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/registration-token/<token>
GET /api/v1/aaa/registration-token/<token>

Get effective object permissions to object specified by path for current user.		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/effective-permissions (Experimental)

Delete object-permissions entries		 DELETE /policy/api/v1/aaa/object-permissions (Experimental)
System Administration > Settings > User Management > Authorization > Object Permissions
Get list of Object-level RBAC entries.		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/object-permissions (Experimental)
System Administration > Settings > User Management > Authorization > Object Permissions
Create/update object permission mappings		 PATCH /policy/api/v1/aaa/object-permissions (Experimental)

List LDAP identity sources		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources

Probe an LDAP identity source		 POST /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources?action=probe_identity_source

Fetch the server certificate of an LDAP server		 POST /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources?action=fetch_certificate

Delete an LDAP identity source		 DELETE /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources/<ldap-identity-source-id>
System Administration > Settings > User Management > LDAP Identity Sources
Read a single LDAP identity source		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources/<ldap-identity-source-id>
System Administration > Settings > User Management > LDAP Identity Sources
Test the configuration of an existing LDAP identity source		 POST /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources/<ldap-identity-source-id>?action=probe
System Administration > Settings > User Management > LDAP Identity Sources
Update an existing LDAP identity source		 PUT /policy/api/v1/aaa/ldap-identity-sources/<ldap-identity-source-id>

System Administration > Settings > User Management > Users
Get the name and role information of the user.		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/user-info
GET /api/v1/aaa/user-info
System Administration > Settings > User Management > VIDM Configuration
Get all the User Groups where vIDM display name matches the search key case insensitively. The search key is checked to be a substring of display name. This is a non paginated API. This API will return as many results that vIDM returns to NSX during the search query. vIDM may not send all results at once so to zero in on the group of interest more characters need to be entered.		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/vidm/groups
GET /api/v1/aaa/vidm/groups
System Administration > Settings > User Management > VIDM Configuration
Get all the users and groups from vIDM matching the search key case insensitively. The search key is checked to be a substring of name or given name or family name of user and display name of group. This is a non paginated API. This API will return as many results that vIDM returns to NSX during the search query. vIDM may not send all results at once so to zero in on the user/group of interest more characters need to be entered.		 POST /policy/api/v1/aaa/vidm/search
POST /api/v1/aaa/vidm/search
System Administration > Settings > User Management > VIDM Configuration
Get all the users from vIDM whose userName, givenName or familyName matches the search key case insensitively. The search key is checked to be a substring of name or given name or family name. This is a non paginated API. This API will return as many results that vIDM returns to NSX during the search query. vIDM may not send all results at once so to zero in on the user of interest more characters need to be entered.		 GET /policy/api/v1/aaa/vidm/users
GET /api/v1/aaa/vidm/users
System Administration > Settings > User Management > VIDM Configuration
Read AAA provider vIDM properties		 GET /api/v1/node/aaa/providers/vidm
GET /api/v1/cluster/<cluster-node-id>/node/aaa/providers/vidm
System Administration > Settings > User Management > VIDM Configuration
Update AAA provider vIDM properties		 PUT /api/v1/node/aaa/providers/vidm
PUT /api/v1/cluster/<cluster-node-id>/node/aaa/providers/vidm
System Administration > Settings > User Management > VIDM Configuration
Read AAA provider vIDM status		 GET /api/v1/cluster/<cluster-node-id>/node/aaa/providers/vidm/status
GET /api/v1/node/aaa/providers/vidm/status

Uncategorized APIs
Set a certificate as a GM or LM Principal Identity certificate		 POST /api/v1/trust-management/certificates?action=set_pi_certificate_for_federation
Uncategorized APIs
Validate a certificate		 GET /api/v1/trust-management/certificates/<cert-id>?action=validate
Uncategorized APIs
Apply a certificate for a CertificateProfile		 POST /api/v1/trust-management/certificates/<cert-id>?action=apply_certificate
